metadata.title: USN-5538-1 -- libtirpc vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that libtirpc incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5538-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libtirpc3 - 1.2.5-1ubuntu0.1 libtirpc-common - 1.2.5-1ubuntu0.1 libtirpc-dev - 1.2.5-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
